unnormalised: My mom's famous biryani recipe calls for exactly 500 gms of basmati rice and needs to be cooked for precisely 25 mins on medium heat, after adding 2 ltrs of water.
normalised: My mom's famous biryani recipe calls for exactly five hundred grams of basmati rice and needs to be cooked for precisely twenty five minutes on medium heat, after adding two liters of water.
